casebody.data:
Senja WIRTA, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. The NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, Individually and as Trustee for Mary Weaver Krapish and Louis M. Ream; and Rober C. Ream, Individually and as Trustee for Louis M. Ream, Defendants-Appellees. No. 278. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 15, 1937. J. Alfred Anderson, of New York City, for appellant. Sage, Gray, Todd & Sims, of New York City (Melber Chambers and Edward H. Spencer, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
